item.title: Largest Value Nested Hash
item.description: I came across this question on the Ruby Reddit the other day: How do I select the largest key: value pair in a nested hash? The problem specifies a hash of data, which I’ll include in full in the gist containing my solution. Omitting data we don’t care about, and removing repetitions, the hash is structured like this: game_hash = { home: { players: { player1: { shoe_size: 16, rebounds: 12, .
